name: Back_to_Earth
description:
In the near future, in 2055, mankind was hit by chaos, blood and war. Aliens from the planet "Denny" decided to destroy us in order to get natural resources.
The war was a long and painful for us, 10 years. We tried to defend our land, but all without success ... Many who tried to resist were destroyed, and those who decided to voluntarily surrender - were taken prisoner ...
There were also those who with others decided to get a spaceship and fly away to another unknown planet.

Continuation read in the game.

P.S. Many thanks to Vitaly Lapin from Russia for help with the project.
